1: <pb/><t>Ayin ti', miman wal max yun waben yail jun yowal c'ul Dios.</t>
2: <t>Max in yuktejtok xol k'ekk'inal bay junelnej k'ekk'olinak. Max in yak' bey bay yulak be yin tol c'am in tzektebal.</t>
3: <t>Masanilc'al c'u cac'al ti' quin is mak'on yetok yowal c'ul.</t>
4: <t>Max yak' ichambok in mimanil, coc'xac'al max yutcantok in bakil.</t>
5: <t>Max quin is makchej yetok yailal c'al etnejc'ulal.</t>
6: <t>Max quin yak' ayjok ec' xol k'ekk'inal, axcaxac'al yayji ec' eb camnak yettax payxa.</t>
7: <t>Max quin is makchej yin tol c'amxa bay chi ca weli; yetok wal mimek cadena max quin is c'albaj.</t>
8: <t>Caxc'al chi el waw yin in k'anon is colwal, c'amxa chi cha yab in tewilal chi wal bay.</t>
9: <t>Max makchej el in be yetok ch'en, yuj tu' xan axac'al bay q'uex be chin toji.</t>
10: <t>Lajan wal max yut ba Cham ayin, axca wal junok no oso chi c'ubaj el ba, axca wal junok no coj tol t'inan chi oc jucnaj win.</t>
11: <t>Max in jutxlay el yuj yul be, coc'xac'al max quin yutcantok cax max in beklaycan yuj.</t>
12: <t>Max watx'nej oc is julbal, max in yaon oc satak is julbal tu'.</t>
13: <t>A julbal max jultek win, najat wal max tojcan yich bay max lowi.</t>
14: <t>Masanilxac'al eb wet animail chi buchwaj eb win; asanxanej ayin chin yak' binaj eb xol is buchwal k'anej.</t>
15: <t>Max in ayji wal ec' yin yatakilal yuj; caw wal c'a' tzet max yak' wuq'uej.</t>
16: <t>Max pojtok we yet max quin ayc'ay sat tx'otx' yuj; toxac'al max in can telan xol pokok yuj.</t>
17: <t>C'amxa in junc'ulal, tokwal naanto el tzalojc'ulal wuj.</t>
18: <t>Chi waloni, tol mayal pax wip; a tinani' c'amxa oc Jehová yipok in c'ul.</t>
19: <t>A yet chin naontek in cusc'ulal c'al wec' in tx'oklil, caw wal ya' chi wabej.</t>
20: <t>A wal yet chin naontek juntzan tu', manxa animaok ay in c'ul chi wabej.</t>
21: <t>Palta ay jun tzet yetal chi wochej tol ayc'al ec' yin in nabal, a ton jun tu' chi wochej chi wac'al oc yipok in c'ul.</t>
22: <t>A ton wal yuj is camc'ulal Jehová, xan c'am chon lajwi ayok, yujtol c'am chi lajwi is yabenc'ulal Cham.</t>
23: <t>Caw wal miman yayji ocok, axca tol ac' chi jil yet junjun k'inibalil.</t>
24: <t>Yuj tu' xan chi wala' tol in satak wal yayji oc Jehová; yuj tu' xan asan Cham ayoc yipok in c'ul.</t>
25: <t>Caw wal watx' Jehová yetok eb tol a Cham chi yaoc yipok c'ul, a ton eb tol chi bekc'al oc ba yul k'ab.</t>
26: <t>Yelxac'al watx' tatol chi jechbanejc'al yin numanil, masantac'al chi colwaj Cham jetok.</t>
27: <t>Yelxac'al watx' tol chi jaoc co ba yul k'ab Cham, yintaxc'al co yaliẍal.</t>
28: <t>Watx' tol chon cancan co tx'oklil c'al yin numanil, yak'ban chi yaoc Jehová yailal jiban.</t>
29: <t>Yowalil tol chon oc yin ayilal, chon ay nojan bay sat tx'otx', talaj chito tx'ox Cham is yabenc'ulal jin.</t>
30: <t>Caxc'al chon mak'layi, chon buchlayi, palta co chaokabi.</t>
31: <t>C'am chon beklaycan yuj Jehová yin junelnej.</t>
32: <t>Caxc'al mi chi ya wal oc co yailal, palta chi cus pax c'ul, yujtol a is camc'ulal caw wal miman yayji ocok.</t>
33: <t>Yujtol wal yel c'am chi cha c'ul Cham chi yaoc cusc'ulal c'al yailal jin.</t>
34: <t>A Jehová c'am chi cha' c'ul tol chi etax eb anima yuj cusc'ulal yul preso,</t>
35: <t>tol chi ilay el yikbej eb yin bay ay yalon yet, ak'bil yuj Cham Axac'al Ocok.</t>
36: <t>Man watx'ok chi yil Cham, tatol c'am chi beyc'ulnelay eb anima yin tojolal.</t>
37: <t>Tokwal ay mactxel chi yal junok k'anej cax chi yunen tzet chi yal tu', ta manak Jehová chi aloni.</t>
38: <t>Ta chi jayoc watx'ilal ma yailal, a Cham chi el yin c'ul yak'on yunej.</t>
39: <t>Tzet xan ok on alxok yuj tzet chon oni yak'ban iquis on. Yelxac'al watx' chi cus co c'ul yuj co yobtakil.</t>
40: <t>Co beyc'ulnejek wal el sic'libil, tzetbil wal yili co beybal, cax chi jaon wal oc co ba yul k'ab Jehová.</t>
41: <t>Jaektok co nabal, c'al co txaj bay Dios aj satcan cax chi jaloni:</t>
42: <t>Max oc co mul c'al co tenomtakil ayach, maj pax ak' tanil co mul jiban.</t>
43: <t>Max jayoc yowal a c'ul jin, max on okteni, max on a c'ayil yin tol c'amxac'al a yabenc'ulalil.</t>
44: <t>Max a c'ubaj el a ba xol jun asun, yet watx' c'amxa chab co tewilal.</t>
45: <t>Axca k'alem max con ot satak masanil anima.</t>
46: <t>Masanilxac'al eb jajc'ul, max jak eb ti' con buchoni.</t>
47: <t>A xiwc'ulal, c'al tx'an yal, c'aybanilal, c'al uchlejbail max jayoc jiban, con chiokabi.</t>
48: <t>Caw wal chi el jililok yal in sat yuj cusc'ulal, yujtol lanan lajwi ay eb wet conob.</t>
49: <t>C'am chin bek wok'i, yuj wabenc'al yail,</t>
50: <t>masantac'al ok yal con yilon aytek Jehová bay satcan.</t>
51: <t>Caw wal ya'xac'al in sat chi wabej yetok wanimail, yuj tzet chi ec'tok yiban eb ix ix bay yul in conobal.</t>
52: <t>C'am wal jabok tzet yujal, xan max quin is yukten eb ajc'ul axcaxac'al chi yun jukten junok no tz'iquin.</t>
53: <t>Iquis in wali max in k'okon aytok eb bay yul jun olan, cax max makchen can eb jun olan tu' yetok junok ch'en, c'amxa bay chi ca weli.</t>
54: <t>Max in aycantok laan xol aej, max in na' wali tol ok in c'ayxac'al elok.</t>
55: <t>Mamin Jehová, max in awji ayach tac'al bay najatil yich jun olan tu'.</t>
56: <t>Ab yoc yul in nuk'; manchak a bek a chaon ab in tewilal, quin chi.</t>
57: <t>Max cach jayoc in c'atan yet jun c'ual yet max ach wawteni, cax max alon ayin: C'am chach xiwi, cachi.</t>
58: <t>Mamin, max in a colcan el yul k'ab camich.</t>
59: <t>Mamin Jehová, ila wal chin utlay yin man tojolalok ti'. Ach ti' beyc'ulnej in el yin tojolal.</t>
60: <t>Ilab wal yili is yochwan eb, c'al naon eb yin tzet ok in yutej.</t>
61: <t>Ab wal xin Mamin Jehová, jantak wal yayji oc tzet chi yal eb win, c'al masanil jantak tzet chi na eb win.</t>
62: <t>Ilab c'apax is k'anej eb ajc'ul tu' chi yala'. Junjunc'al bek chi yalon eb yobal k'anej win.</t>
63: <t>Ila wali, c'ualil c'al ak'balil chin is buch eb.</t>
64: <t>Mamin Jehová, paktzej bay eb axca wal is mojalil yuj tzet chi yun eb.</t>
65: <t>Ak' pitbok el is nabal eb, cax chaontok catab yiban eb.</t>
66: <t>Mamin, uktej eb yetok yowal a c'ul. C'ayokab aj eb oj bay yulyibank'inal ti'.</t>
